title: Reba McEntire slams 'AI mess' while supporting Dolly Parton
description: Reba McEntire has slammed artificial intelligence after a series of AI-generated photos appeared to suggest Dolly Parton was dying, forcing the "Jolene" star to speak out and dismiss the rumors.
content:
She’s an AI survivor.
Country music star Reba McEntire slammed artificial intelligence this week after a series of AI-generated photos appeared to suggest Dolly Parton was dying, forcing the “Jolene” star to speak out and dismiss the rumors.

title: Can TCS’ $6.5 billion AI data centre push revive its growth momentum?
description: Tata Consultancy Services is investing heavily in artificial intelligence and data centres. This move aims to build new capabilities for global companies. The company plans to create 1 gigawatt of data centre capacity. This initiative is a strategic response to slowing revenue growth. TCS is also acquiring ListEngage to boost its Salesforce platform.

title: Two batches of workshop on “AI Aura” organized for CA students
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Oct 9: J&K Branch of NIRC of ICAI organized two batches of a workshop on “AI Aura” held on 6th-7th October and 8th-9th October, exclusively for CA students. The initiative marked a major step towards empowering aspiring Chartered Accountants with knowledge of Artificial Intelligence and its practical applications in the accounting profession. The sessions were conducted by Preksha Jain, a renowned faculty in the field of AI, who provided participants with practical insights into how Artificial Intelligence […]
content:

title: Analysis-US companies' profit growth seen softer, spotlight on AI spending
description: NEW YORK (Reuters) -U.S. companies could report milder earnings growth in the third quarter than earlier this year, partly due to a likely tariff hit, while investors look for signs that heavy spending on artificial intelligence is paying off.
content:

title: UK PM Starmer's India visit concludes with 12 key outcomes in technology, education, trade, and research
description: Both nations announced the establishment of the India-UK Connectivity and Innovation Centre to enhance collaboration in frontier technologies. The India-UK Joint Centre for Artificial Intelligence (AI) was also launched. Additionally, Phase II of the UK-India Critical Minerals Supply Chain Observatory was launched, alongside the establishment of a new satellite campus at IIT-ISM Dhanbad. The establishment of the Critical Minerals Industry Guild will further secure supply chains and promote sustainable green technologies.
content: New Delhi [India], October 10 (ANI): The visit of United Kingdom Prime Minister Keir Starmer to India on October 8-9 concluded with a comprehensive list of 12 key outcomes, marking a major step forward in bilateral cooperation across technology, educ... [2273 chars]
